description:
PyScript and Pyodide have gained a lot of attention, as Python in the
browser presents interesting opportunities. And architectural questions
as well. What does it mean to write an extensible, friendly web platform
targeting Python?

In this talk, learn how PyScript works and watch a treatment of key
technical issues for writing web apps with the WebAssembly version of
Python. What does “file” mean? How do you install something? What are
web workers and how do they impact your architecture?

PyScript itself is constantly evolving on these topics. Come for a
spirited discussion with a fast-paced format.
title: Build Yourself a PyScript
